name: Gaming
alt: Rosalia laying in her bed on her stomach, surrounded by snacks as she plays a game on her laptop.
description: Unsurprisingly, Rosalia loves RPGs almost as much as she loves actual adventures.

name: Peace Out
alt: Rosalia standing in front of a shrine, giving a peace sign with her fingers.
description: She loves to give the peace sign as she's leaving - she really does want you to have a peaceful day.

name: Sakura Festival
alt: Rosalia standing in a forest of cherry blossom trees.
description: Rosalia enjoys the Sakura Festival - she loves the cherry blossom trees.
